Room.Name: Elven Sales Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the sales room for the finest jewelry made by the elves.
Room.LongDescription: A slight, elven maiden stands nearby, ready to show you anything you might desire in the way of magical jewelry. If you wish to see anything, you must ask the maiden about her selection. Then, if you decide to buy, you must tell the maid purchase <item> elven maid. She's pretty, but blond, so you have to be very explicit.
